description: Healthy Infusions Pro 2 inch Straightener.  This straightener is like nothing ever before.  Replaceable conditioning strips are placed on either side of the heating plate coating the hair with a heat resistant conditioner that assists in straightening the hair while also protecting it from heat damage making hair softer, shinier and healthier looking.  This straightener features solid ceramic heating plates, tourmaline additive, digital, LCD display with blue back light and 8 temperature settings up to 410 degrees.
title: Healthy Infusions by Wahl Pro Straightener, 2"
